environmentalSimulator
Class MapControler

java.lang.Object
  environmentalSimulator.MapControler

public class MapControler
extends java.lang.Object

The MVC Controler for the map section. It uses the Swingstates library.

Constructor Detail

MapControler

public MapControler(javax.swing.JPanel mp,
                    javax.swing.JPanel tp,
                    javax.swing.JPanel tvp,
                    javax.swing.JToggleButton therm,
                    javax.swing.JSlider slider,
                    javax.swing.JLabel labelM,
                    javax.swing.JLabel labelC,
                    javax.swing.JLabel labelG,
                    Map m)
This method represents a controler for the map section. These are the events that are treated : - a left click while the thermal toggle button is selected will create a view of a thermal, - a drag and drop on a thermal view will move the thermal, - a drag and drop on a thermal handle will resize the thermal, - a drag and drop over a free space will move all the created shape, - a right click on a thermal will erase it, - a left click on a thermal will open its properties editor and select it as the current thermal.

Parameters:
mp - the map panel
tp - the thermal properties editor panel
therm - the thermal toggle button
tvp - the thermal properties editor panel part for the thermal view
slider - the thermal maximum speed slider
m - the model
labelM - the thermal maximum speed label
labelG -
labelC - the thermal coordinates label
